bullet_points: Review the course idea and objectives.
List the essential competencies and skills for participants.
Consider both foundational and advanced skills relevant to business communication and ChatGPT.
Define evaluation criteria for each competency, ensuring skills are measurable and aligned with business outcomes.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Analyze the course idea to identify core competencies and skills participants should develop, and define evaluation criteria for each.

bullet_points: Identify what knowledge or experience participants should have before taking the course.
Specify any technical, business, or AI-related prerequisites.
Clearly correlate identified prerequisites with specific modules, so pre-existing knowledge gaps can be addressed early in the outline.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Determine prerequisites for participants and correlate them with specific modules.

bullet_points: Outline the main modules.
Ensure progression from basic to advanced topics.
Align modules with the competencies and skills identified.
For each module, provide a brief rationale for its placement and how it builds upon the previous module.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Propose 4-8 main course modules, outline logical flow, and provide rationale for progression.

bullet_points: Provide a brief description of what each module covers.
List key takeaways for each module.
Write learning goals as "Participants [action verb]...".
Integrate a section within each module that explicitly describes how interactive activities and role-playing exercises support the learning goals.
sub_tasks.sub_task: For each module, write a description, key takeaways, specific learning goals, and describe how interactive activities and role-playing support learning.

bullet_points: Identify which modules include hands-on exercises.
Estimate the duration for each exercise or activity.
Provide brief commentary on the complexity of each hands-on module or activity to guide session timing.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Estimate exercise duration for hands-on modules and provide commentary on activity complexity.

bullet_points: Compile all module descriptions, learning goals, key takeaways, and exercise durations.
Present the outline in a clear, organized markdown structure.
Include a final review and feedback mechanism within the outline, outlining how participant feedback might be integrated into refining the course structure post-delivery.
sub_tasks.sub_task: Write the full Course Outline in structured markdown format, including a review and feedback mechanism.
